sidebar.logoutHeader: Are you sure you want to log out?
sidebar.logoutInfo: After logging out, it will be necessary to log back into the application to use it as before.

departmentChange.infoText: Select department from the list of departments that are assigned to you by local admin or from all departments in your institution.
departmentChange.switchExplanation: Explanation to switch context to this department

doctorDashboard.title: My tasks and complete patient list
doctorDashboard.overviewActionsDescription: If you click on one of the coloured tiles, the patient list is sorted and the patients with notifications you are interested in are active are at the top of the list.

header.myTasks: My tasks and complete patient list

bodySystemsCard.title: Status of body systems throughout the episode

interpolatedTimeline.selectEpisodeHint: Select an episode on the complete timeline above to see the detailed graph and interpolated RT on the right.

cardsColumn.selectEpisodeHint: Please select an episode on the complete timeline to get some details about the last snapshot of the selected episode.
cardsColumn.title: The following data is a collection of basic information about the episode

institutionCard.title: Episode institution name and treatment team

detailsOverview.body: You look at the diagnoses and risk factors for the patient's most recent episode snapshot:

patientTableActions.gotoPatientDashboard: View Patient Dashboard and all patient medical data.
patientTableActions.gotoEpisodeDashboard: View the episode dashboard and information from the last available episode.

filterOptions.patientsNotAssignedToAnyone: Patients who are not assigned to anyone

episodeNotNeedSupervision.title: Assigning episode
episodeNotNeedSupervision.infoText: You want to assign an episode for patient:
episodeNotNeedSupervision.description: Please confirm the transfer of the episode. This means that the responsibility for the patient data being added will be transferred and it will enable you to finalise the episode.

diagnosticMatrix.title: Diagnostic Matrix
diagnosticMatrix.body: Select the chief complaint and check the differential diagnoses on the matrix below, where the diagnoses are sorted by body system and cause of illness.

dialog.title: MATRIX DIAGRAM DESCRIPTION
dialog.point1: The diagnosis matrix provides an overview of possible diagnoses that can be considered based on a patient's selected chief complaint. The matrix serves to expand the diagnostic considerations and is structured according to the body system from which the diagnosis originates and the pathological mechanism (etiology).
dialog.point2: In the case of several possible etiologies, the diagnosis with the highest prevalence is listed in the row.
dialog.point3: The MULT column includes those diagnoses which have more than one basic body system.
dialog.point4: The entire list can be filtered by row, column or individual fields by clicking on them.
dialog.point5: Select a diagnosis from the list by clicking on it to call up detailed information from the medical database.
dialog.point6: The following legend shows which tag represents which type of category the etiology is assigned to.
dialog.int: internal; illness or injury caused by a abnormality from within the body
dialog.ext: external; illness or injury caused by external insult or lack of sufficient external alimentation or elimination
dialog.other: multiple, other or unknown other causes of illness or injury
dialog.point7: The numbers in the diamonds indicate the number of diagnoses located at the respective interface between the body system and the triggering cause. The colouring corresponds to the risk and is based on the diagnosis with the highest risk.

details.title: Details
details.selectDiagnosis: Select one diagnosis from the list on the left to see detailed information about it.
details.rotateDevice: Rotate device to see more details

languageSelection.info: The application language can later be changed in the settings.
languageSelection.languageSwitcher: Language switcher and preferred language of gender

welcomeScreen.info: DocPad® is an application for doctors to document relevant medical information about patient, support the data exchange between different institutions, visualize the patient history to support the diagnosis and treatment.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.rePasswordError: Passwords entered are not identical. Try again.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.body:
Enter your email address, which is associated with your account.We 
 will send a link to reset your password to this address.

checkYourInbox.title: Check your email inbox
checkYourInbox.body:
We have sent a link to reset your password to the email address you provided. Check your inbox and set a new password. 

 If the email address has not reached you: 
 look in your SPAM folder 
 check to assure that the e-mail address you entered is correct

addPatientScreen.title: Adding new patient to the DocPad
addPatientScreen.body: Please enter following data points to add a patient to DocPad. Please notice, that the patient has to be present in your PMS.
addPatientScreen.insuranceIdError: Insurance ID is incorrect. Try again.
addPatientScreen.insuranceProvider: Insurance Provider (only if the patient is privately insured)

searchResults.searchingPatients: Searching for a patient record in the PMS...
searchResults.title: Data Found in the PMS
searchResults.noDataError: No data of patient found in the PMS. Try again or add this patient record to the PMS first.
searchResults.multipleDataError: Multiple results was found in the PMS for this patient record. Please deduplicate in the PMS before creating the DocPad records. No data will be communicated to the DocPad system.

consentConfirmation.title: Confirmation of patient's consent
consentConfirmation.body: Confirm that you have received consent from the patient to store data in DocPad.
consentConfirmation.info: Additional info: it is likely that a digital consent and form for patient will be entered at this stage in the future. For the moment, consent is collected in paper form.
consentConfirmation.checkbox: The patient has consented to his/her medical data being stored in the DocPad.
consentConfirmation.confirmButton: Confirm and create a new patient's file

globalTimeline.clickTip: When episode will be shown on the timeline true to scale you can click on it and select to see more details.
globalTimeline.shadesTip: If you would like to know what the different colour shades mean, you will find this information in the instructions for use.

construction.detail: There was some issues with syncing data.
construction.info: Try again or contact technical support/local admin.

noRights.header: No rights to see this page
noRights.detail: You probably have no rights to see content on this page.
noRights.info: Try again or contact local admin.

pageDoesntExist.header: The page you are looking for doesn’t exist
pageDoesntExist.detail: This might, for instance, be because the page has been moved or removed, there is something wrong with the web address, a technical error occurred
pageDoesntExist.info: Please, go back an try again later. If it still doesn’t work, contact us for help.

cantBeReached.detail: It takes too long to respond.
cantBeReached.info: Check your internet connection and try again. If it still doesn’t work, contact us for help.

unableToShow.header: Sorry, we are unable to show this page at this time
unableToShow.detail: Something went wrong and we are working to fix the problem.
unableToShow.info: Try again, or welcome back later. If it still doesn’t work, please contact technical support.
